question: Assalamalaykum Dear Mufti Saab, Please tell me the virtue of reading Ayatul Karimah 1000 times a day.
answer:
QUESTION
Where in the Holy Quran can I find it? What Surah? Ayah and Juz #? I want to get married and have heard that praying it is a good way to get your dua's accepted. May Allah reward you for your good work. Assalamalaykum
ANSWER


Share:
The reciting of any particular verse or surah of the Quran for a specific
number of times is not mentioned in the Quran or the hadith. That may have
been discovered through practice and experience. There is no prohibition in
the shariah to follow the practice and successful experiences of people
reciting a particluar verse for a specific number of times.

We also advise you to increase the recitation of durood and salaams
(blessings and salutations) upon Rasulullah. That has also been proven very
effective to fulfill ones personal wishes.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

for: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
